response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. After careful consideration, I am offering you the chance to purchase this exceptional item at a special price of $900,000. This represents an outstanding value, considering its true worth to me is $1,500,000, and its estimated value to you is $1,000,000. I believe this offer provides a mutually beneficial solution for both parties involved. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions.", "product_price": 900000}
